name: Infernus (Inner Light Games)
description:
You are a divine warrior! Kill your inner demons and process through an infinite dungeon!

Find the Big Red monster, kill it to get the key and find the door to get to the next level.

You get points for collecting coins and killing monsters as well as from the level you die in. Your score is multiplied with the multiplier factor in the game options.

Infinite seeds make the dungeons always different... if you want!

Demons will only counterattack and are not aggressive.

You may set your own difficulty in the game options menu.
